class ApiDataLocationEntity:
    def __init__(
        self, 
        partition_key: str, 
        row_key: str, 
        dataset_location: str, 
        gold_index: str, 
        is_processed : str): 
        self.partition_key = partition_key
        self.row_key = row_key
        self.dataset_location = dataset_location
        self.gold_index = gold_index
        self.is_processed  = is_processed 

    def __str__(self):
        return f"ApiDataLocationEntity(partition_key={self.partition_key}, row_key={self.row_key}, path={self.dataset_location})"

    @classmethod
    def from_dict(cls, entity_dict: dict):
        partition_key = entity_dict.get("PartitionKey")
        row_key = entity_dict.get("RowKey")
        dataset_location = entity_dict.get("Path")
        gold_index = entity_dict.get("GoldIndex", "")
        is_processed  = entity_dict.get("IsProcessed", "")
        return cls(partition_key, row_key, dataset_location, gold_index, is_processed )

    def to_dict(self):
        return {
            "PartitionKey": self.partition_key,
            "RowKey": self.row_key,
            "Path": self.dataset_location,
            "GoldIndex": self.gold_index,
            "IsProcessed": self.is_processed 
        }
